Params: {1: 'Memory loss rate: 98.72%... 99.9%...', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 3: '5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'White.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000041', 6: '1'}
{1: "I don't remember much of what happened after that.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000042', 6: '1'}

{1: 'People came here afterwards and guarded me. Someone kept calling my name, who was that...?', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000043', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And... Why did that person look so worried? Why? Why that look?', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000044', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's the first time I've felt such relief.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000045', 6: '1'}
{1: "Because that person is here. Everyone's here.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000046', 6: '1'}
{1: "Everything I've ever wanted is already here.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000047', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's a name I shouldn't forget... That person's...", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000048', 6: '1'}
{1: '...What is... the name?', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 5: '100000049', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1201_6.jpg'}
{3: "Accessing memory data. Reloading Lucia's memory data..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "ID BPL-01. Member of Babylonia's task force. Military Construct. Gray Raven leader, my name is... Lucia."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And you are...?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm... Lucia. And you are...?"}
{2: "I'm your Commandant.", 3: '22', 4: 'The one who swore to protect you.', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Commandant', 3: "I'm 【kuroname】."}
{3: 'Lucia slowly reaches out her hand, and the moment it touches yours—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1201_5.jpg'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Commandant.'}
